DEFECT.DESCRIPTION: The Drivers module has inferred that the current function is a DRIVER_INITIALIZE function: This is informational only. No problem has been detected.
The function being assigned or passed should be a DRIVER_DISPATCH function: Add the declaration 'DRIVER_DISPATCH IrpDispatcherToDriver;' before the current first declaration of IrpDispatcherToDriver.
The function being assigned or passed should be a DRIVER_UNLOAD function: Add the declaration 'DRIVER_UNLOAD OnUnload;' before the current first declaration of OnUnload.

The function being assigned or passed should be a FAST_IO_CHECK_IF_POSSIBLE function: Add the declaration 'FAST_IO_CHECK_IF_POSSIBLE FsFilterFastIoCheckIfPossible;' before the current first declaration of FsFilterFastIoCheckIfPossible.
The function being assigned or passed should be a FAST_IO_READ function: Add the declaration 'FAST_IO_READ FsFilterFastIoRead;' before the current first declaration of FsFilterFastIoRead.
The function being assigned or passed should be a FAST_IO_WRITE function: Add the declaration 'FAST_IO_WRITE FsFilterFastIoWrite;' before the current first declaration of FsFilterFastIoWrite.

The function being assigned or passed should be a FAST_IO_QUERY_BASIC_INFO function: Add the declaration 'FAST_IO_QUERY_BASIC_INFO FsFilterFastIoQueryBasicInfo;' before the current first declaration of FsFilterFastIoQueryBasicInfo.

The function being assigned or passed should be a FAST_IO_DEVICE_CONTROL function: Add the declaration 'FAST_IO_DEVICE_CONTROL FsFilterFastIoDeviceControl;' before the current first declaration of FsFilterFastIoDeviceControl.

The function being assigned or passed should be a FAST_IO_MDL_READ function: Add the declaration 'FAST_IO_MDL_READ FsFilterFastIoMdlRead;' before the current first declaration of FsFilterFastIoMdlRead.

The dispatch function 'IrpDispatcherToDriver' does not have any __drv_dispatchType annotations: This can be corrected by adding appropriate __drv_dispatchType annotations to the function. Unnecessary casts can cause this warning.
